name: UnofficialDestinyVoiceCompanion
0:
”Alexa, open unofficial destiny voice companion”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unofficial destiny voice companion
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Manage your Destiny 2 characters with your voice.

Equip items and transfer them between your vault and your character with a single command.

Destiny, Destiny 2, the Destiny tricorn, etc. are all trademarks and properties of Bungie. No ownership is claimed of these products.
